# braintrustdata_ai_secrets (Data Source)

Lists Braintrust AI secrets using API-native filters.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# List AI secrets with API-native filters
data "braintrustdata_ai_secrets" "all" {
  limit = 50
}

# Filter AI secrets by exact name, type, and IDs
data "braintrustdata_ai_secrets" "filtered" {
  ai_secret_name  = "OPENAI_API_KEY"
  ai_secret_types = ["openai"]
  filter_ids      = ["ai-secret-123"]
  org_name        = "example-org"
}

output "all_ai_secret_ids" {
  value = data.braintrustdata_ai_secrets.all.ids
}

output "filtered_ai_secrets" {
  value = data.braintrustdata_ai_secrets.filtered.ai_secrets
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `ai_secret_name` (String) Optional exact AI secret name filter.
- `ai_secret_types` (List of String) Optional AI secret type filters.
- `ending_before` (String) Optional pagination cursor to fetch AI secrets before this ID.
- `filter_ids` (List of String) Optional list of AI secret IDs to filter by. Maps to repeated `ids` query parameters.
- `limit` (Number) Optional max number of AI secrets to return.
- `org_name` (String) Optional organization name filter.
- `starting_after` (String) Optional pagination cursor to fetch AI secrets after this ID.

### Read-Only

- `ai_secrets` (Attributes List) List of AI secrets. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--ai_secrets))
- `ids` (List of String) List of returned AI secret IDs.

<a id="nestedatt--ai_secrets"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ai_secrets`

Read-Only:

- `created` (String) The timestamp when the AI secret was created.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the AI secret.
- `metadata` (Map of String) Metadata associated with the AI secret.
- `name` (String) The AI secret name.
- `org_id` (String) The organization ID that the AI secret belongs to.
- `preview_secret` (String) Preview of the secret value.
- `type` (String) The AI secret type.
- `updated_at` (String) The timestamp when the AI secret was last updated.
